text_logic_form: Find the area of the regular hexagon $ACFHGE$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the area of the regular hexagon $ACFHGE$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AC$ is $3$.
The point $D$ lies on the line $AC$.
The line $DC$ is perpendicular to the line $DB$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $AD$, $BC$, $CF$, $DB$, $DC$, $EA$, $EG$, $FH$, and $GH$ forming the regular hexagon $ACFHGE$.
